item.description:
**
** The library has confirmed the rescheduled date for Fri, Mar 7
**

The Nashua Public Library is showing "Into the Wild" (2007).

Here's the description from the iMDB

"Based on a true story and the bestselling book by Jon Krakauer. After graduating from Emory University in 1992, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless (Hirsch) abandons his possessions, gave his entire $24,000 savings account to charity and hitchhiked to Alaska to live in the wilderness. Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters that shape his life."

Rated: R
Runtime: 2 hrs 28 mins

Directed by Sean Penn

Starring: Emile Hirsch, Marcia Gay Harden, William Hurt, Jena Malone, Catherine Keener, Vince Vaughn, Kristen Stewart, Hal Holbrook, Zach Galifianakis
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in the art gallery outside the theater (downstairs at the library).
item.why: I have heard this is a good movie. Plus, it's free.
item.name: NPL film: Into The Wild
